name: Rampaging Wizard
description: First big game project I was apart of, and going to be apart of many more. The game is a basic 2D platformer, that gives you control of an angry wizard! You shoot and rampage your way through a world of deadly skeletons, undead knights, ballistas, and a Dragon! As you complete each level you're given unique upgrades to choose from to enhance your wizardry and adventure. Good luck!
